```{r}
set.seed(0)
x = generate.mog(n.data=1000, mu=c(0,.8, .3), sigma=c(.01,.01,.02), prior=c(.6,.2,.2))
hist(x, breaks=100)

ans1 = EM(data=x, n.classes=3, prior.choice='equal.priors.random.params', max.iter=1000)
```
